name: encyclopedist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who creates or writes for an encyclopedia (= a book, website, or set of books containing many articles arranged in alphabetical order about different subjects): He was an encyclopedist, known for his work on medical texts. She has an international reputation as a scientist and encyclopaedist.
More examplesFewer examplesThe first account of this medical procedure was made by a Roman encyclopedist 2000 years ago.Early encyclopedists were familiar with these theories. Much of the information we have comes from the writings of historians, geographers, and encyclopedists of the time.The botanists who named the tree were influenced by its description in the writings of the Roman encyclopaedist, Pliny the Elder.
